next_actions: Run clustered bootstraps for the PPO estimator and finalize the ≥$100k/≥$1MM H3 contrasts before the next PAP freeze.
Expand the H4 literature (post-2018) and test class/gender interactions on the ordinal and ≥5 binary anxiety outcomes prior to promotion.
Weave the new H3/H4 tables/figures into the manuscript sensitivity section and prepare confirmatory-ready public tables.
